Name: Tabs
Description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.

SubComponentData.Name: Root
SubComponentData.Description: Contains all the tabs component parts.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: defaultValue
PropData.Description: The value of the tab that should be active when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the tabs.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: The controlled value of the tab to activate. Should be used in conjunction with onValueChange.

PropData.Name: onValueChange
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the value changes.

EnumData.Name: orientation
EnumData.Description: Event handler called when the value changes.

EnumData.Name: activationMode
EnumData.Description: The reading direction of the tabs. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

SubComponentData.Name: List
SubComponentData.Description: Contains the triggers that are aligned along the edge of the active content.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: When automatic, tabs are activated when receiving focus. When manual, tabs are activated when clicked.

PropData.Name: loop
PropData.Description: When true, keyboard navigation will loop from last tab to first, and vice versa.

SubComponentData.Name: Trigger
SubComponentData.Description: The button that activates its associated content.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: A unique value that associates the trigger with a content.

PropData.Name: disabled
PropData.Description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the tab.

SubComponentData.Name: Content
SubComponentData.Description: Contains the content associated with each trigger.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: A unique value that associates the content with a trigger.

PropData.Name: forceMount
PropData.Description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.
